title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Wednesday 8 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: motorists fined at nottingham `` bus gate '' .
is there a right way to pronounce southwell ?
celebrations in market square last night for panthers .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : freezing night ahead
text: a cold and rather cloudy night with scattered wintry showers .
a widespread air frost is expected .
minimum temperature staying just above freezing in urban areas but will be -1c in the countryside .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: kanye believe it ? !
text: limited edition kanye west trainers are not on sale in the uk until saturday , but this group of men are already queuing outside one of the stores that will be selling them .
the yeezy boosts , which cost £ 150 a pair , are sold out in a lot of places online and are apparently only going to be available at this bridlesmith gate store .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: online firms should 'fight against crime '
text: amazon told us they do n't want to comment .
but amazon 's not the only website that paddy tipping is worried about .
he says the time has come for all internet firms to do more to keep us safe and fight against crime .
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: man bought terrorism-related documents online
text: smith,46 , saw himself as a crusader and claimed he wanted to protect this country from the so-called islamic state .
he was found guilty of stockpiling dangerous explosives and having a copy of the anarchy cookbook version 2000 that he 'd bought online at his home in clifton .
now mr tipping wants online retailers to be held responsible for what they 're selling .

he said : `` if they 're providing material that 's dangerous - and it is - if they 're not prepared to take it down voluntarily through a code of practice , then i think ultimately we 'll get to the position where companies can and should be prosecuted , ''
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: police commissioner wants internet firms to do more
text: nottinghamshire 's police and crime commissioner paddy tipping has told me major internet companies should be prosecuted if they do n't do more to stop online crime .
he 's been speaking after so-called `` survivalist '' from nottingham , roger smith , was jailed last month under terrorism laws , for downloading a bomb-making guide from amazon .
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: pub landlord named as tourism finalist
text: the landlord of the ye olde trip to jerusalem has made the shortlist of visitengland 's superstar awards to recognise 'unsung heroes in tourism ' .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: gritters heading out tonight
text: with a cold and frosty night ahead , the council 's gritting team are expecting a busy night .
gritting tonight .
full forecast : # grittertwitter # nottingham
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : anna soubry on brexit
text: here 's what broxtowe mp anna soubry had to say to bbc news earlier today .
she was with labour mp for pontypridd owen smith .
author: BBC News Channel

documents.title: is this the biggest family photo ever ?
text: this story on the bbc website about 500 relatives meeting for a family photo has caught my eye this afternoon .
i 'm seriously impressed with how they managed to get everyone together for it !
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: residents discuss level crossing options
text: people in attenborough are being given the chance to express their views about the future of three level crossings today .
network rail want to close the crossings to improve safety along the railway line but many residents disagree with the idea , saying they make the village and surrounding areas more accessible .
the meeting is taking place now until 19:30 at attenborough village hall .
author: BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: missing man found
text: we told you earlier about a police appeal for missing lee hobster .
they said he has now been `` found safe and well '' .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: lee hughes for manager ?
text: the former notts county striker has applied to become the new boss at worcester city .
he 's been at the national league north side for two years and in his 22 years in the game has worked with 28 different bosses .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: your photos : the a610 at dawn
text: steve a was up early and took this photo of ikea island at dawn .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man charged after dealership fire dies in prison
text: a man charged with arson after a fire at a birmingham car dealership was found dead in his cell at nottingham prison last week .
the prison service confirmed marcin dlugolecki 's body was found on 1 february and an independent investigation is now being carried out .
mr dlugolecki had been due to appear at birmingham crown court on 15 february .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: traffic lights have been vandalised
text: traffic lights have been vandalised

documents.title: tory mp 'a realist ' over brexit deal
text: broxtowe mp anna soubry has been talking to bbc news this morning about another day of debating in the commons .
she said : `` i trust my prime minister and the government , but i 'm also a realist '' .
she said it would be `` impossible '' for the government to get a good deal for britain on trade , customs , security , and many other issues , within two years .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: al hasawi delays chief exec decision
text: there 's been more criticism over the last 24 hours of the under-fire forest chairman fawaz al-hasawi .
he 'd suggested last week he 'd appoint a new chief executive at the club , but it now seems that 's been delayed .

the kuwaiti issued a statement last night saying they ca n't rush the decision and that until the `` right candidate is ready '' , he has confidence the current staff at the club are more than capable .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: mp throws head in hands over debate
text: the brexit debate in the commons was all too much for anna soubry yesterday
just @ twitterid reacting to @ twitterid speaking about brexit in the commons .
@ twitterid @ twitterid 56 % of @ twitterid 's constituents do the same .
but not to worry , they 'll still vote for him .
no chance .
he 's toast at the next ge .

# brexit

redwood will go .

it seems she 's now just heard francois fillon 's defense about # fillongate # penelopefillon

documents.title: drivers confused by signs
text: most people i spoke to thought the sign was n't warning about a bus lane camera .
`` that sign tends to represent a speed camera , '' one man told me .
`` if 11,000 people have been fined , it 's obvious that it 's not visible enough or not clear enough for people to see or interpret what the signs are saying . ''
another man said : `` i 'm not a local .
i must admit that would confuse me or i would n't necessarily see that , it 's fairly small is n't it . ''
another driver told me his sat-nav tried to take him down the road but he turned round when he noticed a pedestrian in the street .
author: Mike O'Sullivan
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: signs warn about cameras in action
text: shakespeare street is one of nottingham 's most striking streets , with the gothic-revival splendour of nottingham trent university 's arkwright building and further along , ultra-modern buildings for students .
but the west-bound end of the street is a 24-hour camera controlled area , where more than 11,200 drivers got tickets via the anpr camera in one financial year .
there is a blue sign plus a `` box brownie '' sign half way up a lamp-post that 's there to warn drivers about the 'bus lane camera enforcement ' .
author: Mike O'Sullivan
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: motorists fined at 'bus gate with no buses '
text: here 's more from bbc online about the pedestrian zone in nottingham which is not on a bus route but does have bus enforcement cameras .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: concerns for missing man
text: police say they are concerned about the safety of 40-year-old lee hobster who was reported missing from st ann 's at around 16:50 on monday .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: divided opinions
text: the suh-thull / southwell pronunciation debate has continued on our facebook page .
danielle eva moroz wrote : `` southwell was once told its named after the south well .
is it this well that is in the rodney in the center of the town ?
freda hallsworth said : `` perhaps it depends on where you live in notts .
we in the north ( near derbys border ) tend to shorten words . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: civic reception for panthers
text: there was a celebration in market square last night for nottingham panthers after they won the continental cup .
if you could n't make it down you can re-watch what happened on bbc radio nottingham sport 's facebook page .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: your views : area is 'clearly signposted '
text: thousands of motorists fined for driving through so-called `` bus gate '' in nottingham
its signposted & clearly is a pedestrian zone .
some buses for student travel do use the area .
not sure how motorists can moan
modern day dick turpin , crooked council
not sticking up for the council just saying it 's clearly a pedestrian zone .

documents.title: council expects fines to fall
text: nottingham city council insists the `` bus gate '' has been properly signed since it was introduced last year .
in a statement , it said that while this part of the road was not used by any scheduled bus services , it was used by some privately-hired student buses .
it said the number of people being fined was expected to fall as people get used to the changes .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: signs are 'confusing '' says highways group
text: the institute of highway engineers says the signs are confusing and that the council is on `` dodgy ground '' .
the area by nottingham trent university is described as a `` pedestrian zone '' in signs at both entrances .
however , signs further away warn there is `` 24 hr bus lane enforcement on shakespeare street '' .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: thousands of motorists caught out by bus lane cameras
text: more than 11,000 drivers have been fined for going through a so-called `` bus gate '' in nottingham city centre that is not used on any bus routes .
the pedestrian zone at the junction with shakespeare street and goldsmith street has seen drivers slapped with a £ 60 fine - or £ 30 if it is paid early .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : the southwell / suh-thull verdict
text: and here 's what the people in southwell had to say .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: your questions : is there a right way to pronounce southwell ?
text: we gave some southwell locals the chance to settle the argument once and for all , and while there was a clear preference for 'south-well ' over 'suh-thull ' in the town it did n't entirely solve the matter .
numerous 'incomers ' and those from outside of the town prefer the alternate pronunciation , so we dipped into the past for further guidance .
luckily the library offers handy hints on what to say when in southwell .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: your questions : how do you pronounce southwell ?
text: you 've been using your questions to get to the bottom of a contentious issue : how exactly do you pronounce southwell ?
it 's not a clear-cut answer , with ardent fans of `` saying it as it reads '' met by stiff supporters of the alternative 'suh-thull ' .
we asked some locals how they say it , in a bid to finally lay the matter to rest .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : slow traffic m1 northbound
text: there 's slow traffic and one lane 's closed on the m1 northbound between j29a , markham ( markham vale ) and j30 , a616 ( worksop ) , because of a broken down vehicle .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: join us for today 's updates
text: good morning and welcome to wednesday 's updates for nottinghamshire .
i noticed this morning it 's getting considerably lighter on my way into work .
always makes the early starts easier .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online
